  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3412</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Laureates: 1986- the Nobel Prize in Physiology or medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Laureaten: 1986- der Nobelpreis in der
Physiologie oder in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lauréats Nobel : 1986- le prix Nobel dans 
la physiologie ou la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laureates De Nobel: 1986- o prêmio de nobel
no physiology ou na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laureates Nobel: 1986- il premio Nobel nella
fisiologia o nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαφνοστεφές Νόμπελ: 1986- το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
στη φυσιολογία ή την ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laureados Nobel: 1986- el premio Nobel en 
fisiología o medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information on the research done by Stanley Cohen, Rita Levi-Montalcini which won them the Nobel Prize for their discoveries of growth factors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hormones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growth factors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über die Forschung erfolgt von 
Stanley Cohen, Rita Levi-Montalcini, das sie der Nobelpreis für ihre 
Entdeckungen der Wachstumfaktoren gewann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur la recherche faite par 
Stanley Cohen, Rita Levi-Montalcini qui les a gagnées le prix 
Nobel pour leurs découvertes des facteurs de croissance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação na pesquisa feita por Stanley Cohen, 
Rita Levi-Montalcini que os ganhou o prêmio de nobel para suas 
descobertas de fatores do crescimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sulla ricerca fatta da Stanley 
Cohen, Rita Levi-Montalcini che le ha vinte il premio Nobel per le 
loro scoperte dei fattori di sviluppo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για την έρευνα που γίνεται από το 
Stanley Cohen, Rita Levi-Montalcini ωχηθχ τους κέρδισε το
βραβείο Νόμπελ για τις ανακαλύψεις τους παραγόντων αύξησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información sobre la investigación hecha por 
Stanley Cohen, Rita Levi-Montalcini que las ganó el premio Nobel para
sus descubrimientos de los factores del crecimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hormone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wachstumfaktoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobelpreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hormones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fattori di sviluppo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
